Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Oversight and Investigations

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting owners of commercial premises from knowingly leasing commercial premises to unlicensed sellers of controlled substances or tobacco products and requiring the sheriff to produce a monthly report on enforcement relating to such unlicensed sellers
